law.catch_line: Elder Abuse Committee -- Membership -- Duties -- Annual report.

text.section: The committee shall produce an annual report of their activities, products, and recommendations for public policy to the Governor and the Legislative Research Commission.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 66, effective July 12, 2012; and ch. 158, sec. 34, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 16, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 293, effective June 20, 2005; and ch. 132, sec. 29, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 3, effective June 21, 2001. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 40, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 370, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1998.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2012). This statute was amended by 2012 Ky. Acts chs. 146 and 158, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
